thread.section_title: Backcountry Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Backcountry Gear | backcountrygear.com
thread.title: Hayg

author: Hayg
title: Hayg
text: I have spent a lot (thousands) on backpacking gear in the last 2 years updating all my gear and clothes, and have experience with all the online stores. In all these transactions, Backcountry Gear has been a top shopping source. Their prices and inventory match anyone else's, and their special sales are excellent. In fact, most of the big-ticket items I have bought have been with BG. And whenever I have called them, I have had excellent personal service too. Great store.
